fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Royal Finger (Day): Your next vote will count as two, including nightfall votes.
- Decide Fate (Day, 1 use): Immediately hang a player, or grant a player hanging immunity for the day. The town will be notified if you did either.
- Guards! (Night, 2 uses): Grant yourself Powerful defense against all attacks.
- Safeguard (Night, 4 uses): Astrally grant another player Powerful defense against all attacks.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Cannot be jailed by jailor-type roles. Additionally, if you are hanged, the town cannot hang anyone the next day.
- Conversion immune.
- Cannot be targeted by investigative abilities, all investigative abilities used on you will fail no matter what.
- Cannot co-exist with Evil King (2030), Neutral King (2031), and Psycho King (2032).
- You are revealed as the King at the beginning of the game. The town will not be notified of your alignment.
- You may choose to have a role that shows above the game's players called King, and may choose the role's color.
- At the beginning of the game, your role is renamed to [your faction] King.
- **Q: Why is this Good Support and not Town Support?** A: uhh to prevent an Evil King from spawning in a non-Town role list and being screwed over, look the host has rule 17 if they care that much

fields.name: CITY KING CHANGES:
fields.value:
- Decide Fate and Royal Finger are usable at day and night.
- Decide Fate and Royal Finger also to both the target and a specific role (except the latter when pardoning someone)
- Always applies when City is in the game, even if you are a different good faction's king.
**ARMY KING CHANGES**
- Gain a use of Decide Fate, Guards!, and Safeguard when the Marshall reveals themself.
